title: Darwin on death of Tamerlane MCQ 3

content.question: Which of the following developments in the period 1450–1750 could best be used as evidence to modify Darwin’s argument in the first paragraph about the establishment of Eurasian empires on “nomadic foundations”?

choices.label: The creation of the Ottoman Empire
The Ming overthrow of the Yuan dynasty in China
The fall of the Mughal Empire
The establishment of the Safavid Empire

content.answer: The establishment of the Safavid Empire

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
